item.title: VNN February Submissions Theme: Snow/Winter Designs!
item.dc:creator: Hoshi
item.description:
Every VOCALOID fan knows February is when the Snow Miku festivities hit full swing in Sapporo. But why should Miku have all the fun?! VNN’s February submissions theme is “Snow/Winter Designs.” While you can use Miku, you’re also open to use any other virtual idol from VOCALOID to Alter/Ego and UTAU to CeVIO, as well …

The post VNN February Submissions Theme: Snow/Winter Designs! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Every VOCALOID fan knows February is when the Snow Miku festivities hit full swing in Sapporo. But why should Miku have all the fun?! VNN’s February submissions theme is “Snow/Winter Designs.” While you can use Miku, you’re also open to use any other virtual idol from VOCALOID to Alter/Ego and UTAU to CeVIO, as well as our three mascots.

You’re free to use official winter/snow designs of the characters such as ALYS Hiver or the snow versions of our mascots, or you can go wild and make your own designs!

As always, we’ll accept all types of art. While this submissions theme is based more around visual art, we’ll still accept songs! Feel free to cosplay, draw, use MMD, or even photograph figures! Just make sure that your submission follows our guidelines.

Theme Specific Guidelines

  • Submissions will be accepted until February 28th at 11:59 PM (23:59) EST.
  • All submissions (including songs) must be based around Snow/Winter.
  • Submissions do NOT have to be of official designs. Draw your favorite character in whatever outfit you want!

How to Submit

As always, you can email us at contact@vocaloidnews.net, or contact us on Facebook or Twitter.

In addition, please remember to give us a high quality version of your work! Do NOT upload it via Facebook Messenger. If you don’t want to upload the piece yourself, please send it via email. You can also link to any high quality upload you’ve done on websites such as DeviantArt or Twitter.

Please include how to credit you in your message as well. We want to let everyone know where they can find your amazing art!

The post VNN February Submissions Theme: Snow/Winter Designs! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: VNN’s December Submissions Theme Announced!
item.dc:creator: Hoshi
item.description:
After the success of our November themed submissions featuring DEX & DAINA, we’ve decided to continue with the monthly themes! This time with a bit more notice. Fans will have all of December to create any art (from songs to illustrations and cosplay, to whatever comes to your mind) and submit it to VNN for …

The post VNN’s December Submissions Theme Announced! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
After the success of our November themed submissions featuring DEX & DAINA, we’ve decided to continue with the monthly themes! This time with a bit more notice. Fans will have all of December to create any art (from songs to illustrations and cosplay, to whatever comes to your mind) and submit it to VNN for a chance to be featured!

December Submissions Theme

This month’s theme is two parts; you can combine the two parts or do it separately. Our theme is “December Birthdays” and “Winter Holidays!” Due to the vast amount of December birthdays, there’s no way we could hold an event for every individual. So instead, we’re grouping them all together! In addition, you can also create works themed on winter holidays. Everything from Christmas, Hanukkah, and Kwanzaa, to the New Year and anything else you may celebrate! As mentioned before, you don’t have to combine the two. If you want to just draw a picture of the Kagamines without the winter holiday theme, that’s perfectly fine.

December Birthdays

As we said, there are a TON of December birthdays. So we’ll list them all here for fans to easily access.

SF-A2 miki (December 4th)
Kaai Yuuki (December 4th)
Hiyama Kiyoteru (December 4th)
Utatane Piko (December 8th)
Tone Rion (December 16th)
MAIKA (December 18th)
OLIVER (December 21st)
AVANNA (December 22nd)
BIG AL (December 22nd)
CUL (December 22nd)
Yuzuki Yukari (December 22nd)
Bruno (December 23rd)
Clara (December 23rd)
Merli (December 24th)
Kagamine Rin/Len (December 27th)

Submission Rules

As always, the original submission rules apply. However, in addition to these rules, we have one extra request this time around.

Please have all works be original.

This doesn’t mean that you have to create a brand new work just for the fan submissions though! Any of your original work no matter how old it is, will be accepted. We just ask that no song covers be entered this time around as we’re looking for unique, new content to feature.

Your work does not have to be winter holiday themed. however, Any original song featuring one or more of the December birthday VOCALOIDs works just as well as an original song themed around the holidays. Take your pick and have fun!

Submissions are due by December 24th, 11:59 PM (23:59) GMT.

Extra Note

Please do NOT directly upload your works to Facebook messenger and send them to us via Facebook page messages. It ruins the quality and makes it more difficult to properly credit you. Please upload your work somewhere public that will keep the resolution. We suggest either DeviantArt or Pixiv. Once you upload it, you can send us the link however you’d like.

If you would rather send us the picture and not have it uploaded, please email us at contact@vocaloidnews.net.

The post VNN’s December Submissions Theme Announced! appeared first on VNN.
